categories: Renegade Gore-Tex Mid Light Hiking Boots
description: Rugged to stand up to rough terrain, lightweight for fast-packing and thru-hiking. The Renegade's mid-height cuff and supportive frame stabilizes your feet when carrying heavier loads in uneven terrain. The membrane keeps your feet dry during river encounters.Durable leather upper with Gore-Tex® waterproof-breathable membrane.Support frame wraps lower foot for support.Dual-density midsole cushions and comforts.Nylon shank provides torsional rigidity.Vibram® Evo outsole with multi-directional lugs for stability on loose terrain.
name: Lowa Renegade Gore-Tex Mid Light Hiking Boots - Men's
